eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Arizona; Apache; Cochise; Gila; Graham; Greenlee; La Paz; Maricopa; Mohave; Navajo; Pima; Pinal; Santa Cruz; Yavapai; Yuma, AZ; AT 12:20 AM ON OCT 14, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 10:40 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for the Chandler Police Department. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Chandler PD is looking for white female Cherie Boulton last seen driving a white 2022 Hyundai Elantra with Arizona license plate 8 F A 0 H F. Cherie is described as five feet three inches tall with blond hair and brown eyes, wearing a patterned blouse. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
